item.title: Bollard knocked over., 21st October
item.description:
Contact Allianz insurance - Claim ref. MK/1/GA/104916 08/10/2025 - Our insured has reversed and knocked down the black metal bollard. Send estimate and engineer reports to customerclaims@allianz.co.uk. Quote the claim ref. MK/1/GA/104916 We shall instruct our loss adjusters who will contact you to discuss settlement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carting Lane, Waterloo, City of Westminster

item.title: Abandoned car next to park, 21st October
item.description:
